Entries.default: The roar of the arena fades into a hollow din as the shimmering form of the robed woman materializes before you.
"Congratulations, Watcher."
"And the chosen of the other Faces of the Hunt. I assume they are next?"
"That's it? I was hoping for more."
"Perhaps a moment of silence for the other contenders is in order."

"But, as you wish it."

Her shimmering form cranes its head sideways, studying you for a long, silent moment.
"Now that we - the Faces of the Hunt - have chosen our hunters, the grand winnowing may proceed."
"Worry not. If it's battle you seek, more yet remains."
[Say nothing.]
"I'm ready for whatever's next."
"Is there some sort of power struggle between you and the other Faces of the Hunt?"
"How many more must die before the Crucible decides I'm worthy?"
"What if I fail to become champion?"
"Remember that there is a fine line between seizing the initiative and charging blindly."
"Everything is struggle."
"Should you survive this coming battle of the chosen, you will be crowned Champion of the Hunt."
"Then you will die, and your better will be crowned in your stead."
"Fight well, brother seeker."
"You will then resonate with the spiritual core of the Crucible."
"Curious. Given your success in the Crucible, I would not have anticipated your sentimentality for prey."
"As the Crucible dictates."
"I do not recommend it."
"Everything on this island more so."
"That's not much of an answer."
"I suppose it is not. But you are the Seeking Face's chosen."
"I won't rob you of the opportunity to uncover the answer on your own."
"Who were you, before you became the Seeking Face?"
"I was a scholar and an engineer. A seeker."
"I gave much to delve into the darkest recesses of reality. We peeled away its skin and peered into the cracks."
"What did you find?"
"Nothing save what we took with us."
"You were Engwithan."
She nods wordlessly.
"I have so many questions."
"They will have to wait, I'm afraid."
"Ready yourself. May the Changeling grant you the wisdom to recognize feint from strike and opportunity from trap."
"Your hand will rest upon the heart of Kazuwari."
"In some ways, you will not be unlike a god."
